metadata.name: Born A Crime
metadata.description:
Many thanks to my reliance on metaphor, the major factor in realizing this unique work of Art intended to convey with a deliberate distortion my unfiltered perception of the realities of being born in a flawed system.

This edition is inspired after reading the book "Born a Crime: Stories from a South African Childhood" 
by Trevor Noah.

This work is particularly a letter of hope and Love to all individual (as evident in the subject's life)
whose only major companion through Life is the mother's unconventional, unconditional Love. 

The facial puzzles represented here are intentionally weaved together to form a moving portrait of a man who made his way against all odds.


Dimensions: 3383 x 4534
Width: 3383 pixels
Height: 4595 pixels
Horizontal Resolution: 300 dpi
Vertical Resolution: 300 dpi
Bit depth: 24
Size: 8.80 MB
Item Type: JPG File
